price: as if they had never dwelt there. Behold, away with Midian just as it was with Thamūd!
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā buʿ'dan limadyana kamā baʿidat thamūdu
